Title: Money Heist
Description: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' has a plan to pull off the biggest heist in recorded history.

Title: The Mother
Description: While fleeing from dangerous assailants, an assassin comes out of hiding to protect the daughter she left earlier in life.

Title: Extraction
Description: A black-market mercenary who has nothing to lose is hired to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

Title: The Silence
Description: A study on social anxiety and noise.

Title: Redefining Education
Description: A legacy of Chu Van An schools.
